summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Robbins Spring Brook Addition to Riverton; northeast quarter of Section 27, Township 24 North, Range 4 East; northeast quarter of Section 21, Township 23 North Range 4 East; southeast quarter of Section 17, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; southeast quarter of Section 9, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; and, Green Lake Five Acre Tracts to the City of Seattle.
